markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Brine May](/Feats.aspx?ID=4530) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Changeling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=212" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 77 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your mother was a [sea hag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=254), granting you one sea-green or blue eye. You find comfort both in the sea and on the shore. Whenever you roll a success on an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to [Swim](/Actions.aspx?ID=39), you get a critical success instead. If you end your turn in water without having succeeded at a Swim action that round, you don’t sink (but you might still be moved by the current).
name: Brine May

summary_markdown: Your mother was a [sea hag](/Monsters.aspx?ID=254), granting you one sea-green or blue eye.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Brine May Source Player Core pg. 77 2.0 --- Your mother was a sea hag, granting you one sea-green or blue eye. You find comfort both in the sea and on the shore. Whenever you roll a success on an Athletics check to Swim, you get a critical success instead. If you end your turn in water without having succeeded at a Swim action that round, you don’t sink (but you might still be moved by the current).
